00245 class CompareCosineNode
00246 {
00247  public:
00248 
00249   // Comparison function for construction of priority queue.
00250   bool operator() (const CosineTree* a, const CosineTree* b) const
00251   {
00252     return a->L2Error() < b->L2Error();
00253   }
00254 };
